dialog: What do you think of this painting of cranes amongst pine trees, crafted by a renowned painter during the King Dynasty?
By Merlin, they look almost lifelike.
And, in traditional wizarding belief, cranes and pine trees symbolize a long and fruitful life.
It's time for me to depart. My name is Ruth Carson. Might I have my bill, please?
Yes, it comes to 167 Galleons.
Much obliged.
Well, Mitzuko-san, I do hope you enjoy your stay. This restaurant is my personal favorite in Taipei. It brings back memories of my travels throughout Europe during my younger years.
It looks truly magical. Very authentic.
The chef was trained in Florence. Their pasta dishes are simply magnificent.
Understood. What do you recommend?
Hmm... You must try the mushroom fettucine. It's a spellbinding dish.
Is it particularly salty?
Not in the slightest. It has a very delicate flavor.
What does 'Duppa del Giono' mean? I apologize, I'm not sure how to pronounce it.
Oh, it means 'soup of the day'. I'll ask the waiter what they have available today. Have you considered trying the mussels cooked in the Italian way? They're delectable.
No, I haven't. That sounds like an excellent idea.
I am calling to inquire about the available position for an usher.
Is there anything in particular you would like to know?
What qualities are you seeking in an applicant for the position of an usher?
We require the candidate for the role of usher to be comely, stand no less than 5 feet 5 inches tall, and have an affinity for smiling.
